Body: I recently did a factory reset on my Motorola X - 2nd Generation Phone.  The problem is that I had several voice files that are actually important as they are part of a Book Publishing to be published soon.  I just need some direction as to if there is an effective way out there that can recover the actual folders/files from an Android that was essentially wiped.  I am hitting over my head right now as I am really disciplined when it comes to backing up my data on my Laptop but now realize I have to be the same with my Smartphones if I have important data on there. Any suggestions or advice here?
Title: How to recover files (MP4) from Motorola Moto X (2nd Gen) after a factory reset?

history.Text: I am actually embarrassed that I am even writing this but I am human.  I recently did a factory reset on my Motorola X - 2nd Generation Phone.  The problem is that I had several voice Files that are actually important as they are part of a Book Publishing to be Published soon.  I just need some direction as to if there is an effective Software Tool out there that can recover the actual Folders/Files from an Android that was essentially wiped.  I am hitting over my head right now as I am really disciplined when it comes to backing up my data on my Laptop but now realize I have to be the same with my Smartphones if I have important data on there.  Any suggestions?  Any advice?  I would really appreciate it any help.Thanks,Chris
Need help with reovering some Voice MP4 Files from an Android that I did a Factory Reset on
